content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Incomplete Power Generation Setup near (-9.5, -0.5)
This setup is intended for generating electricity but is currently incomplete and not connected.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-2.5)
*   Boiler at Position(x=-6.5, y=5.0)
*   Boiler at Position(x=-4.5, y=9.0)
*   Steam Engine at Position(x=-0.5, y=12.5)
*
